Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your expectations and contribute significantly to your success. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
